mentions.candidate: Nick has been campaigning to stop Labour's cuts to Chase Farm since 2004. Nick enlisted the help of David Cameron and Boris Johnson, and collected 9,000 signatures on a petition against the cuts.

issues.health: Nick has been campaigning to stop Labour's cuts to Chase Farm since 2004.

quotes.text: I'm backing Nick because of his real world experience.
Nick fought my corner to win back my disabled parking badge, which had been taken away from me unfairly. He made a real difference.

images.caption: Nick started a campaign to support local shops struggling through recession, persuading Enfield council to offer free parking these days.
Nick has been campaigning to stop Labour's cuts to Chase Farm since 2004.
Nick was contacted by Jean Gregory of Sandringham Close. Nick fought my corner to win back my disabled parking badge.
